body.name: BOOMJOY Microfiber Mops for Floor Cleaning with 3 Washable Pads, Wet and Dry Mops for Hardwood Floor Cleaning, Laminate Floor Cleaner Mop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 12 mins
features: 【Clip Cloth Design】New upgrade can be added to the cloth of the gods dust mop for hardwood floors, serrated clip can be fastened to clip the cloth, the home idle old clothes, rags can be replaced
【Microfiber Cloth】Microfiber cloth can adsorb dust hair, dust particles can be easily sucked away, keep the ground clean as new, strong cleaning power and does not leave stains

【360 ° rotation】 Microfiber mop pads head can be 360 ° rotation cleaning dead ends flexible into a variety of crevices, the bottom of the sofa bottom coffee table bottom bed bottom and other dead ends can be easily cleaned
【Wet and dry mop】BOOMJOY hardwood floor mop have two effects, wet mop can quickly absorb water and easily take away the dirt, dry mop can instantly suck away dust and pet hairs

【Two microfiber floor mop pads】2 reusable washable flat mop pads can be washed with water when dirty and can be reused. In addition, there is a small comb that can remove dog hair, other dust balls or dirt

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BOOMJOY DUST FLOOR MOP BOOMJOY SELF WRINGING MOP BOOMJOY FEATHER DUSTER Weight 1.47pounds 2.41pounds 1.19 pounds Length 51‘’ 48‘’ 84‘’ Material Microfiber, Iron Pole Microfiber, Iron Pole Microfiber, stainless steel pole Wet or Dry Wet and Dry Wet and Dry Wet and Dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this mop💝 after I mopped the floor it was easy to take the cloth off and drop it in the washing machine. The mop is very light. The head turns easily so I can get the corners. It is very smooth on my hardwood floors. And I am handicapped so this is a easy map to manoeuvre . I don't have to worry so much about putting too much water on the floor and slipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for hardwood floors
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased 5 BoomJoy mops and it is a must for routine cleaning of hardwood floors. Construction is very sturdy and requires minimal effort to quickly and efficiently clean the floor. I use Dyson handheld vac to clean the mop head after each use and when warranted machine wash it. It's so effective it actually motivates you to clean more often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller and light easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It is well made but a little smaller than I like. The pile thickness is very thin and not a plush as I was hoping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the best!
reviews.reviewText: Best mop to date! I have literally tried everything on the market and this mop is so easy! It’s light, it’s efficient and it picks up dog hair! Best purchase this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So nice not having to push a 45 pound mop
reviews.reviewText: I work in a small shop that has big open spaces of hardwood floors. While my employer provides a heavy duty mop and bucket, it's just too big for me to pick up and empty, not to mention hauling around a sopping wet mop that gains 30 pounds when wet.This dust mop just changed the game. It's good for spot mopping as well as regular mopping. It has a little comb that lets you scrape off hair and dirt, but also lets the nap stand back up. Turning is easy and it lets me reach under furniture without bending over too far. It works great damp or dry and I can just throw the rug like cloth in the washer to clean.It comes with 2 of those rug type rags, so no need to rip up towels. The comb seems weird until you use it and see that it comes in handy, so don't throw it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes it easy to clean up the tile floor around my potter's wheel
reviews.reviewText: Before I got this mop, I was cleaning up the floor around the potter's wheel (it always gets splattered with wet mud when I'm making pots) on my hands and knees with a wet sponge. With this mop and a spray bottle of plain water, it's easy to clean up my splatters in just a few minutes. Then the fiber pad detaches easily and can be rinsed in the sink and hung to dry between sessions at the wheel. It could also be washed in the washing machine but I haven't needed to do this yet as it rinses out so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Only one microfiber pad
reviews.reviewText: The mop is nice and arrived quickly. Unfortunately the mop only came with 1 micro fiber pad (not 3). Also the pads are not sized correctly for the mop. They barely fit.We reached out to customer service with no response.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS SWEEPER/MOP
reviews.reviewText: This thing is pretty amazing! I love the extra pads so that I can wash them and keep them clean, no more buying wet wipe pads this thing saves me so much money!!! I love that it bands and moves in all directions and It can be used to sweep or mop! I get to use whatever cleaner i like and it works like a charm perfect for tight spaces!!
